Text.Page: You overcame your self-doubt, and felt your inner strength growing.

Why was I chosen to be a hero? I was nothing special... so why do I have to deal with the failures?

They always call me to come to the rescue, to vanquish the bad guys...

But there are always casualties.
And I have to live with that...

But... could I ever have saved them?
Was I chosen because I was the best? Or because I was the best they could get? What if that's never going to be enough?
